name: Counter Sniper Modern Strike 2
description:
Counter Sniper Modern Strike 2 is thrilling action game to deal with crazy and deadly global terrorist groups. Your got master sniper and tactical shooters lead them as pro gunman and save the hostages life. In this crisis situation your battlefield training will leads you to success.
Features:

• Different shooting scenarios.
• Multiple survival missions in snow and windy environment.
• Stunning 3D graphics with amazing gameplay.
• Easy & intuitive controls.
